japanese: 次に、!c04校舎２Ｆエリア!c07。/美術室や風紀委員会室があるわよ。
english: Next, !c04School 2F Area!c07. /Art room and Discipline Committee room are there.

japanese: 技とパラメータを確認したら/!aボタンを押してね！
english: After checking techniques and parameters /press !a button!

japanese: 構わないよ。/射的で勝負でもしてみるか？
english: Fine with me. /Want to compete at target shooting?

japanese: 止まったマスに!c03ジャスキャラ!c07や、/他のプレイヤーがいる場合は/イベントや戦闘が起こるわ。
english: If !c03Justice Characters!c07 or other players /are on the space you land on, /events or battles occur.

japanese: 普通盛りで/大盛りで/いらない
english: Regular size/ Large size/ Don't need

japanese: 残念だけど……/いつかはそうなるって判ってた事だし。/笑顔で見送ってあげるわ。
english: Unfortunately... /I knew this would happen someday. /I'll see you off with a smile.

japanese: 戸惑ってるだけだよ。/アキラが聖純女学院に行って、/雰囲気が変わったからさ。
english: Just confused. /Akira went to Seijun Girls' Academy, /so the atmosphere changed.

japanese: 戸惑ってるだけだよ。/アキラは聖純女学院に行って、/雰囲気が変わったからね。
english: Just confused. /Akira went to Seijun Girls' Academy, /so the atmosphere changed.

japanese: 方向ボタンでマップ全体を/見渡すことができます
english: You can view the entire map /with direction buttons

japanese: 時間が許す限り、/全部の店をちゃんと回ってやるぜ。
english: As long as time allows, /I'll properly visit all shops.

japanese: 正しい答えだと思いますよ。
english: I think that's the right answer.

japanese: 昔はそれなりに自信はあったんだが、/何しろ人に聞かせるのは/久しぶりでね……。
english: I had some confidence before, but /it's been a while since I played for others...

japanese: 楽しみが増えましたよ。/ありがとう、先輩。/フフフ……。
english: I'm looking forward to it more. /Thanks, senpai. /Hehehe...

japanese: 楽器に興味がおありなんでしたら、/今度、私が個人的に/演奏の方もお教えしますよ。
english: If you're interested in instruments, /next time I'll personally /teach you to play.

japanese: 残念だけど……/いつかはそうなるって判ってた事だしな。/笑顔で見送ってあげるよ。
english: Unfortunately... /I knew this would happen someday. /I'll see you off with a smile.

japanese: 断わって、ハイときく顔じゃなかったぞ！
english: That face won't accept 'yes' when refused!

japanese: 本来、島津流は実戦空手なのですが、/私は人を殴るのは/好きではないのですよ……。
english: Originally, Shimazu style is practical karate, but /I don't like hitting people...

japanese: 手放しの賞賛は、/不安を相手に与えてしまうこともある。
english: Unconditional praise /can make the other person anxious.

japanese: 振動の設定を変更します
english: Change vibration settings

japanese: 指定した科目の!c01単位!c07を/強奪することができます
english: You can steal !c01Credits!c07 /from specified subject

japanese: 斬！
english: Slash!

japanese: 最近、少しずつ/ゆとりみたいなものが出てきたみたい。
english: Lately, seems like /some breathing room is appearing.

japanese: 構いませんよ。/保健室においておけばいいんですね。
english: Fine with me. /Just leave it in the nurse's office.

japanese: 暴力はいかん、暴力はな！
english: No violence, no violence!
